  proposition: Matterport3D is a research paper about learning from RGB-D data in indoor environments published at the International Conference on 3D Vision in 2017.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Matterport3D|PUBLISHED_IN|International Conference on 3D Vision
    Matterport3D|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2017
    Matterport3D|RESEARCH_FOCUS|learning from RGB-D data in indoor environments

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Yang Liu and colleagues published a comprehensive survey on Aligning Cyber Space with Physical World in Embodied AI in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yang Liu|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    Yang Liu|RESEARCH_FOCUS|Aligning Cyber Space with Physical World in Embodied AI

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Guanzhi Wang and collaborators developed Voyager, an open-ended embodied agent with large language models, published in Transactions on Machine Learning Research in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Guanzhi Wang|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    Voyager|PUBLISHED_IN|Transactions on Machine Learning Research
    Voyager|TYPE|open-ended embodied agent
    Voyager|TECHNOLOGY|large language models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Guanzhi Wang|DEVELOPED|Voyager

  proposition: Yunfan Jiang and team introduced VIMA, a general robot manipulation system with multimodal prompts, at the Fortieth International Conference on Machine Learning in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yunfan Jiang|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    VIMA|PUBLISHED_IN|Fortieth International Conference on Machine Learning
    VIMA|TYPE|general robot manipulation system
    VIMA|FEATURE|multimodal prompts

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yunfan Jiang|INTRODUCED|VIMA

  proposition: Brianna Zitkovich and colleagues presented RT-2, a vision-language-action model that transfers web knowledge to robotic control, at the 7th Annual Conference on Robot Learning in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Brianna Zitkovich|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    RT-2|PUBLISHED_IN|7th Annual Conference on Robot Learning
    RT-2|TYPE|vision-language-action model
    RT-2|FEATURE|transfers web knowledge to robotic control

    entity-entity relationships:
    Brianna Zitkovich|PRESENTED|RT-2

  proposition: Xingcheng Zhou and researchers published a survey and outlook on vision language models in autonomous driving in IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Vehicles in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xingcheng Zhou|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    Xingcheng Zhou|RESEARCH_FOCUS|vision language models in autonomous driving
    Xingcheng Zhou|PUBLISHED_IN|IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Vehicles

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Tianrui Guan and team developed TNS, a terrain traversability mapping and navigation system for autonomous excavators, at Robotics: Science and Systems XVIII in 2021.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Tianrui Guan|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2021
    TNS|PUBLISHED_IN|Robotics: Science and Systems XVIII
    TNS|TYPE|terrain traversability mapping and navigation system
    TNS|APPLICATION|autonomous excavators

    entity-entity relationships:
    Tianrui Guan|DEVELOPED|TNS

  proposition: Tianrui Guan and colleagues expanded their work with TNES, a terrain traversability mapping, navigation, and excavation system for autonomous excavators, published in Autonomous Robots in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Tianrui Guan|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    TNES|PUBLISHED_IN|Autonomous Robots
    TNES|TYPE|terrain traversability mapping, navigation, and excavation system
    TNES|APPLICATION|autonomous excavators

    entity-entity relationships:
    Tianrui Guan|EXPANDED|TNES

  proposition: Silen Naihin and researchers explored testing language model agents safely in the wild, publishing a paper on ArXiv in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Silen Naihin|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    Silen Naihin|RESEARCH_FOCUS|testing language model agents safely in the wild
    Silen Naihin|PUBLISHED_IN|ArXiv

    None

  proposition: Grégoire Délétang and team conducted a causal analysis of agent behavior for AI safety, publishing on ArXiv in 2021.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Grégoire Délétang|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2021
    Grégoire Délétang|RESEARCH_FOCUS|causal analysis of agent behavior for AI safety

    None

  proposition: Paul Knott and collaborators evaluated the robustness of collaborative agents at the International Conference on Autonomous Agents and MultiAgent Systems in 2021.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Paul Knott|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2021
    Paul Knott|RESEARCH_FOCUS|robustness of collaborative agents
    Paul Knott|PUBLISHED_IN|International Conference on Autonomous Agents and MultiAgent Systems

    None

  proposition: James F. Mullen and colleagues created a dataset for enabling embodied agents to detect anomalous situations, published in IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    James F. Mullen|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    James F. Mullen|RESEARCH_FOCUS|dataset for enabling embodied agents to detect anomalous situations
    James F. Mullen|PUBLISHED_IN|IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Kaiming He and researchers developed deep residual learning for image recognition, presenting at the IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition in 2016.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Kaiming He|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2016
    Kaiming He|RESEARCH_FOCUS|deep residual learning for image recognition
    Kaiming He|PUBLISHED_IN|IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Alex H Lang and team created PointPillars, a fast encoder for object detection from point clouds.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    PointPillars|TYPE|fast encoder for object detection from point clouds

    entity-entity relationships:
    Alex H Lang|CREATED|PointPillars
